definition: to regain/to retake/to take back/to withdraw/to revoke
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: You might as well go out and repossess cars or work for a collection agency.
sentences.chinese: 你還不如出去收回別人的汽車或爲一家收回機構工作。

sentences.english: You might as well go out and repossess cars or work for a collection agency.
sentences.chinese: 你還不如出去收回別人的汽車或爲一家收回機構工作。

sentences.english: I will unsay no words that I've spoken about it.
sentences.chinese: 我不想收回我對此所說過的話。

sentences.english: After finishing fax, please take back documents promptly and keep the desk clean.
sentences.chinese: 大家發完傳真後，請及時收回文件，並保持桌面整潔。

sentences.english: House repossessions rise as borrowers lose their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 銀行收回抵押房產的情況上升，而貸款者失去了工作。

sentences.english: If unable to recover, would be discounted against domestic money.
sentences.chinese: 如果無法收回，就得將住宅折價抵充錢款。

sentences.english: In most cases, the cost of ergonomics equipment is recouped within the first year.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數情況下，設備在第一年內收回成本工效。

sentences.english: He shall have his medal and diploma in the above-mentioned event withdrawn," the IOC said.
sentences.chinese: 他在前述賽事中的金牌與榮譽證書應被收回。

sentences.english: Mercy means God holds back the condemnation we deserve.
sentences.chinese: 上帝收回我們應得的責罰，這就是他的仁慈。

sentences.english: The five people sickened in California and three in Texas have all recovered.
sentences.chinese: 患病的5人在加利福尼亞州和得克薩斯州三都收回。

sentences.english: But the memory was like a retrieved file.
sentences.chinese: 但記憶像被收回去的卷宗。

sentences.english: Over three-quarters of the land has been reclaimed.
sentences.chinese: 四分之三多的已經收回了。

sentences.english: When workers retire, they can withdraw money from the plan.
sentences.chinese: 當工人們退休了，他們能從計劃中收回金錢。

sentences.english: Therefore I reprehend myself, and do penance in dust and ashes.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，我收回我所說過的話，坐在灰塵中懺悔。

sentences.english: If a competitor holsters a firearm during the course of fire, the following will apply.
sentences.chinese: 如果選手在比賽中將槍枝收回槍套，應適用下列條件。

sentences.english: The pick withdraws, replaced by Andy's peering eye.
sentences.chinese: 石錘收回，取而代之的是安迪隱現的目光。

definition: to return (an item)/to send back/to go back
to turn back/to put back/reversal/melodic inversion (in music)
to utilize/to put sth to use
to pass on/to resell/to change hands
to withdraw/to leave/to retreat/to pull out
to remove/to sack/to get rid of/to relieve (sb of their duties)/to free/to lift (an embargo)/to rescind (an agreement)
to withdraw/to abort/to quit/to log out (computing)
